item.title: CVE-2017-7480|2024-08-05T16:04:11.545Z -- red%20hat%2C%20inc. -- rkhunter
item.description: rkhunter versions before 1.4.4 are vulnerable to file download over insecure channel when doing mirror update resulting into potential remote code execution.
